stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Galahad, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Galahad gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine End the run.
text: When the Runner encounters Galahad, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Galahad gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Galahad
